text: Cêā(muḥạmmạd) k̆ ca h̄ĕn mākmāy nı h̄mū̀ phwk k̄heā pĕn mitr kạb brrdā p̄hū̂ thī̀ pt̩is̄eṭh ṣ̄rạthṭhā ch̀āng lew r̂āy cring«s̄ìng thī̀ tạw k̄hxng phwk k̄heā xeng dị̂ prakxb l̀wngh̄n̂ā wị̂ s̄ảh̄rạb phwk k̄heā xạnpĕn h̄e tu h̄ı̂ xạllxḥ̒ thrng krîw phwk k̄heā læa phwk k̄heā ca khng xyū̀ nı kār lngthos̄ʹ tlxd kāl
